channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Jazz guitarist returning home for Old St. Hilary’s concert July 25
item.description: Tiburon native Perry Smith will perform with his trio New West Guitars July 25 at Old St. Hilary’s Landmark.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Young knitters offer warmth, kindness, one square at a time
item.description: A group of Reed Union School District students has knitted a 40-inch-by-40-inch blanket to give to new immigrants arriving in the U.S.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Pick of the Week: Pavement film with band founder Q&A, music at Cinelounge
item.description: Spiral Stairs, aka Scott Kannberg, started the band Pavement as a duo with front man Stephen Malkmus.
item.dc:creator: The Ark

item.title: Everyday Encounters: A well-traveled resident is grateful to call Tiburon home
item.description: Haines grew up living in several countries due to his father’s work in humanitarian relief.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Travel Bug: Mediterranean cruise crosses continents and cultures
item.description: Over 11 days, the Travel Bug explored two continents and four countries, immersing ourselves in rich culture and history while celebrating a milestone anniversary.
item.dc:creator: Marybeth Bond-Sheppard

item.title: Belvedere probes cyberattack as report warns of rising risks
item.description: The May 28 breach occurred just a month before a Marin civil grand jury report about vulnerabilities across the county's independent networks.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: The Ranch is named Tiburon Peninsula’s business of the year
item.description: The Ranch has been named the Tiburon Peninsula Chamber of Commerce’s Business of the Year.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon lacrosse stars named among top student-athletes in the country
item.description: Redwood's John Anderluh was named an All-Academic honoree, and Lucy Jeffers is an All-American.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Pandemic piano hobby turns into a Billboard-charting music career
item.description: Her single “Move Your Body Slowly" reached No. 26 on Billboard’s adult-contemporary chart.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: The Ark wins national excellence honors, sets record with 54 awards in 2024
item.description: The Ark has been named among the nation’s best community weeklies, winning 26 awards in the National Newspaper Association’s 2025 Better Newspapers Contest.
item.dc:creator: The Ark
